name: test-bed-schemas
description: Schema's commonly used for the Common Information Space or Common Simulation Space.

scripts.patch-release: npm run clean && npm run build && npm version patch && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.minor-release: npm run clean && npm run build && npm version minor && npm publish && git push --follow-tags
scripts.major-release: npm run clean && npm run build && npm version major && npm publish && git push --follow-tags

author: Erik Vullings <erik.vullings@gmail.com> (http://www.tno.nl)
